channel.title: [639]just wondering[639]
channel.description:
im just wondering if it is possible to make it that whenever an npc dies it teleports the killer sumwhere else and like gives the killer and quest item or sumthing because i want to make a quest where when you kill an npc u get an item
if it is possible how can i do it? :confused:

item.title: [639]just wondering[639]
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

You need to go into NPC.java and just add a switch statement under the death method (you don’t have to) to make it easy on you.

int npcId = getId(); ---------------------------^^^^^^^^^^

The death method shouldn’t be that hard to find. I just can’t bother finding it because I don’t have a computer.
Under there add something like source.getPlayer().teleport(0,0,0);

I’ve just got a shitty tablet btw

item.title: [639]just wondering[639]
item.dc:creator: @tomato721 tomato721
item.description:
@tomato721 wrote:

ty but i need to know where do i add that but i guess u dunno either cuz u probably use [PI]
if it was for 639 it would be like
if (KillNpc(NpcIDGoesHere) {
TeleportHandler.telePlayer(player, 2792, 4427, 0, 0, 0, false);
player.getInventory().addItem(item(amount));
}

anyways thx for trying to help me but i di believe i need to write my own methods for KillNpc so sumthing ahyways im not too good in java either but i just started taking lessons like 2 months ago

item.title: [639]just wondering[639]
item.dc:creator: @matiasmunk matiasmunk
item.description:
@matiasmunk wrote:

Now I don’t know much about 639’s and don’t know where any of the shit goes.
But I believe you can do a check, if you killed the npc or so.
Like:

if (KillNpc(NpcIDGoesHere) {
c.movePlayer(xxxx,xxxx);
c.getItems().addItem(ItemID, Amount);
}

Again I don’t know much about 639’s or even Java at all.
But something like that
